name: Electro Cicin's Gleam
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Fatui Electro Cicin Mage, equip this card.
After Fatui Electro Cicin Mage equips this card, immediately use Misty Call once.
If your Fatui Electro Cicin Mage who has this card equipped is on the field, before you choose an action: If Electro Cicin's Usage(s) is at least 3, then Electro Cicin will immediately deal 1 Electro DMG. (Usage(s) will be consumed, once per Round)
(You must have Fatui Electro Cicin Mage in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2404]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A2404] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S24042]</color> once.
If your $[A2404] who has this card equipped is on the field, before you choose an action: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124041]</color>'s $[K3] is at least 3, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124041]</color> will immediately deal 1 $[K104]. ($[K3] will be consumed, once per Round)
(You must have $[A2404] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fatui Electro Cicin Mage</color>, equip this card.
After Fatui Electro Cicin Mage equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Misty Call</color> once.
If your Fatui Electro Cicin Mage who has this card equipped is on the field, before you choose an action: If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Cicin</color>'s <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> is at least 3, then <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Cicin</color> will immediately deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>. (<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> will be consumed, once per Round)
(You must have Fatui Electro Cicin Mage in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytitle: Electro Cicin Mage: Electro Cicin's Gleam
storytext: "Are you... here to play with me?"
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Electro Cicin Mage at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas
